alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:00AM CDT until June 24 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greeley County in central Nebraska... Nance County in central Nebraska... Northwestern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Howard County in central Nebraska... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 300 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Petersburg to 7 miles south of Spalding to near St. Paul, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Palmer around 320 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Fullerton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
